ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.story_title: Ivermectin can kill COVID-19 within 48 hours', Monash University study finds
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.summary: A study from Monash University in Australia has shown that ivermectin, a widely-used parasitic, can kill coronavirus within 48 hours.
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.what: A university study in Australia showing that ivermectin can kill coronavirus rapidly
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.why: It shows that a readily available compound can kill coronavirus within 48 hours

challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.story_title: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.summary: GlobalData is suggesting potential challenges with Novavax's development of a coronavirus vaccine based on trial data.
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.what: A perspective on a coronavirus vaccine from Novavax and the challenges it may face
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.why: Because it relates to the potential efficacy of a coronavirus vaccine in development

australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.story_title: Australian GPs urged to prescribe ivermectin triple therapy to fight COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.summary: GPs in Australian are being urged to prescribe ivermectin combination therapy to treat coronavirus to help save lives during the pandemic. The therapy comprises zinc and doxycyline.
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.what: Australian GPs being urged to prescribe the drug ivermectin for COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.why: It suggests a treatment for COVID-19 that is being used by GPs

japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.story_title: Japan is first country to approve COVID-19 cocktail Ronapreve
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.summary: Japan has approved the coronavirus combination treatment Ronapreve to treat coronavirus, becoming the first country in the world to do so.
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.what: The approval of a COVID-19 combination in Japan
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.why: Because of the need of coronavirus patients in Japan/more widely

pfizer.summary: A series of reports on the activities of Pfizer over a two/three month period in the spring of 2021. These reports cover topics including: the company's development and commercialisation of its coronavirus vaccine Comirnaty; development and regulatory updates on Pfizer's other products across therapy areas and on its collaborations with other companies; the group's financial performance and sales projections; wider strategic development updates at the company, and outside comment/views on Pfizer's activities.

astrazeneca.summary: The activities of AstraZeneca over a two/three month period in the spring of 2021, as summarised by a series of news reports. These reports include coverage of the following: the company's development, manufacture and roll-out of a coronavirus vaccine and an ongoing legal dispute with the EU relating to the vaccine; the group's financial performance; trial results and regulatory approvals of other AstraZeneca products; analysis of the performance of the company's chief executive, Pascal Soriot.
